CustomField.description: Use Question-Inline to horizontally align the question and response fields. Use Question-Stacked to place the question above the response fields. For the best experience, the system may override certain layout options when a user takes a survey on a tablet or mobile device.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Choose the desired question variant for the survey response interface: Question-Inline: Aligns the question and response fields horizontally, placing them side by side. Question-Stacked: Positions the question above the response fields, stacking them vertically. Please note that for optimal user experience, the layout options may be automatically adjusted on tablet or mobile devices to ensure proper display and usability.
CustomField.label: Question Variant
